data.title: Margaritaville Beach Resort Cap Cana
data.meta_description: Margaritaville Beach Resort Cap Cana is an all-inclusive resort in the Dominican Republic with a beautiful beach, delicious food and amazing drinks.
data.text:
Margaritaville Island Reserve Resort Cap Cana provides the perfect all-inclusive resort setting for guests who want to escape the everyday with a tropical change in latitude - in the breathtaking Dominican Republic. Offering all the world-class amenities of a luxurious, all-inclusive resort coupled with a laid-back, beachy vibe, this resort is the perfect place for people who value exceptional quality without any pretense. From the moment guests enter, they’ll be greeted with flip flops and immediately transported to a seaside paradise.

Whether you wish to spend the day relaxing in a beach hammock, enjoying tropical-inspired spa treatments at St. Somewhere Spa, or celebrating that it’s always 5 o’Clock Somewhere with live entertainment and a poolside margarita, there are a variety of authentic experiences for all with two unique ways to stay at Margaritaville Island Reserve Cap Cana.

Choose your ideal escape for a more personalized paradise. Experience Hammock, an adults-only area of the resort for those seeking a more mature, elevated getaway. Family-friendly adventure awaits at Wave, which is brimming with activities and experiences for guests of all ages. Each area features its own dedicated pool and restaurant, and of course, the impeccable level of service guests have come to know and love.

With exceptional restaurants, specialty bars, and daily live music, Margaritaville Island Reserve Resort Cap Cana is a place to raise a glass and take a bite out of paradise. The resort's all-inclusive 516 guestrooms and 39 spectacular luxury villas with private balcony pools are a blend of island-inspired design and luxurious comfort, offering guests a license to chill, relax, and unwind in paradise.

Located just 15 minutes from the Punta Cana International Airport, the resort is the perfect setting for guests to get away from the everyday and just chill. Set on one of the Dominican’s best kept secrets, Juanillo Beach is famous for its turquoise waters, white sand, and calm waves.
